name: Caer, Inc.
description: Manufacturer of baby food products intended to provide science-based early childhood meals and vitamins for brain development. The company offers fresh, nutrient-dense, low-sugar baby food tailored to the diets of different age groups, enabling parents to provide their children with sufficient nutrition, particularly during their first few years of life.
